Python version (`uv run python --version`):

A clear, concise description of the issue.

```bash
uv run python scripts/individual/example_script.py --arg value
```

**Expected behaviour**
What you expected to happen.

**Actual behaviour**
What actually happened. Paste the traceback or attach the `.error.log` from `scripts/errors/`.
